text: Chesterfield Charter Township is a charter township in Macomb County in the U.S. state of Michigan. As of the 2020 census, 45,376 people lived there. The township was founded in 1842 and is part of Metro Detroit. == References == Category:1840s establishments in Michigan Category:1842 establishments in the United States Category:Charter townships in Michigan
title: Chesterfield Township, Michigan
